About PNSQC

For over four decades, PNSQC has brought together the Pacific Northwest quality community.

Our mission

PNSQC is a volunteer-led, nonprofit conference committed to advancing software quality practices through education, collaboration, and professional growth.

Community-driven

Our steering committee and program teams are made up of practitioners who shape the conference each year.

Practical learning

We curate talks, workshops, and forums that highlight real-world experiences and applied techniques.

Inclusive growth

We welcome professionals across roles and career stages, fostering mentorship and diverse perspectives.

Conference leadership

PNSQC is guided by a board of directors and program leaders responsible for the conference vision, finances, and community partnerships.

  • Board of Directors oversees strategy, governance, and long-term sustainability.
  • Program Committee curates sessions, workshops, and speakers.
  • Volunteer teams support marketing, operations, sponsorship, and attendee experience.

Get involved

Interested in volunteering, speaking, or mentoring? We welcome new voices and fresh ideas every year.

Connect with the team

Values we uphold

Integrity

We prioritize honest dialogue, constructive feedback, and data-backed decision-making.

Curiosity

We celebrate experimentation, continuous learning, and the craft of software quality.

Belonging

We create spaces where every attendee feels respected, welcomed, and empowered.
